Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Val, I need the space.

Quote.Speaker: Val
Quote.Text: All right guys, clear out.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Everybody out.

Quote.Speaker: Val
Quote.Text: Promise me you're going to clean up.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: I can't promise what I'm going to do or not do.

Quote.Speaker: Val
Quote.Text: Promise me that-

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Obviously I'm going to clean up.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Stress is like the uptight mayor or a town who's saying, "Hey, we're uptight, you can't dance," and then you have to be like, "Oh yeah, Mayor Stress? Well watch this!" And then... we dance. Oh how we dance. [dances to Kenny Loggin's Footloose] Sex also works.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Hey! Jim's back from jury duty.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Hey! Tuna! He's back.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Hey.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Oh, look at this. [hugs Jim] Tuna wrap.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Okay.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: [grabs Jim's wrist] Hand roll.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Yeah.

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: How was jury duty?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: It was pretty uneventful, actually.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Can't believe they let someone like you serve on a jury. Makes me question the whole judicial system.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: What was the case?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Uh, hit and run.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Ooh, "the case of the hit and run," that's exciting.

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: Did you send him to the slammer?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Nope. Not guilty.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Of course you found him not guilty. [mocking voice] "Oh, he apologized and I just really want him to like me, mm."

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: We're best friends, actually. We're going wine-tasting next weekend, if you want to come.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Not coming, have plans.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Okay.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: I did get called in to jury duty. And they released me around noon, so, didn't think it was worth it to come back to work for a half day. And then the next morning Pam was a little overwhelmed with the kids so I took an extra day to help out. And then three other days happened.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Ah! Angela had the baby!

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Is it black? 'Cause that would be hilarious.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Why?

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: You know.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Would it be more hilarious than Angela having a Chinese baby?

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: A little bit, yeah. Right guys? Back me up.

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: Eh, a little bit.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Oh, did I win the pool?

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Ah, no. Right month, wrong year.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Well no one won the pool. Angela wasn't due for another month.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: We should all go to the hospital and visit her.

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: Oh, I'd love to but, um-

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Aw man, I would but I can't miss any more work.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Well Kevin and I have to go, Accounting is its own little family.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Yeah, Oscar's the dad, I'm Oscar's dad and Angela's my mom.

Quote.Speaker: Gabe
Quote.Text: Everyone, our very own Angela-

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: We all got the email, some of us are going to go visit.

Quote.Speaker: Gabe
Quote.Text: Oh, I am so in.

Quote.Speaker: Gabe
Quote.Text: I love maternity wards. It's the perfect blend of love and horror. Things can go so wrong or so right.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Come on, Judge Judy, tell us your case. What were the deets?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Mine was actually a pretty boring case, so-

Quote.Speaker: Meredith
Quote.Text: How could it be boring? You were there for five days. Titillate us.

Quote.Speaker: Stanley
Quote.Text: Yeah, you owe us. I had to stay until six twice to cover for you. My wife got to the TV first, had to sit through damn Rizzoli and damn Isles.

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: Yeah, my car got smashed visiting one of your clients and I had to have it detailed and they took my meter change.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Wow, I'm really sorry.

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: Yeah.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: I never considered that my week off would make everyone else's job harder. The least I could do is give them a good story.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: [demonstrating with napkin holder and salt shaker] So Phyllis, he was here, and then the car came and did- he was like that. Yeah, so it had to be a double backflip, actually.

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: You know, when I was on j-duty, uh, Strangler case, we used to recreate the various stranglings with empanadas from- at Ernesto's.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Oh man, Ernesto's. That was our favorite restaurant too.

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: You mean food truck. Ernesto's was a food truck.

Quote.Speaker: Meredith
Quote.Text: Toby, shut your hole about the empanadas. Nobody cares about the empanadas.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: I was in Los Angeles last year. Jim tricked me into thinking I'd won a walk-on part on NCIS, but that's not important. While I was being kicked off the lot, I saw food trucks everywhere. Everyone in Los Angeles eats from them. And nobody calls them restaurants.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: [whispering] Guys, I don't know how many of you have seen- Gabe? Bring it in. I don't know how many of you have seen a premature baby before. It's going to be really tiny, so please don't say anything offensive.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Got that, bimbo?

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Got it, bimbo. [Oscar knocks at the door]

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Yes?

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Knock, knock. Oh!

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Hi!

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Oh... I don't- I don't want any- what are you guys doing here?

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: We wanted to say hi to the newest little Dunder Mifflinite.

Quote.Speaker: Senator Lipton
Quote.Text: Well, meet our not-so-little bundle of joy, Philip Halsted Lipton.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: Phillip is so fat.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Kevin!

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: You warned me not to say anything if it was tiny, Oscar. But you didn't prepare me for a big, giant, fat baby.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Hey.

Quote.Speaker: Senator Lipton
Quote.Text: Yes, he's substantial.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: He's more than substantial. He's a monster.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: So this whole hit and run thing, there's just one part I can't figure out. You said it was at a four-way stop...

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Mm-hmm.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: And the victim rode his bicycle into the left hand turn lane but the perp was already in the left-hand turn lane?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Mm-hmm.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: See, that's what I'm having trouble with, because the fact is, you never said he was on a bicycle. [villainous laugh] Busted, Halpert!

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Okay, wait, wait.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Yes! Andy, get out here.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: No. I never said he was on a bicycle. I just said I wasn't listening to you.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: I am making a citizen's arrest. You have the right to remain silent. You have the right to beg for mercy. You have the right to request judgment by combat. Dwight's rights.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: What's up, gangstas?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Jim was lying about jury duty. He was lying the whole time so he could go do yoga or go canoeing. I don't know what this pervert likes. Fire him!

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Dwight, not everything is a conspiracy theory.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: I have Jim on the record saying that the vic-

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: No. Dwight! I have me on the record, saying to you, take a chill pill.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: I don't- I don't need to take a chill pill.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Here, right there. [mimes giving Dwight a pill and a glass] Down the hatch.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: I really don't want to take the chill pill. [mimes taking pill]

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Attaboy. Good. Now, chill.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Okay, okay. [sits, exhales] But let's just say that Jim was lying about jury duty. You would have to fire him, right?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Yeah, sure, of course. I'd fire him to Timbuktu. [Jim laughs nervously]

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: That's good enough for me. [exhales again]

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: ...and Pam was just going crazy, trying to take care of Philip because Cece has been out of control recently, and- look, Andy, it doesn't matter. The truth is, I just feel terrible lying to you.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: I feel terrible getting lied to. No one's ever lied to me before.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Okay. I think the best thing to do right now is just come clean and tell everybody the truth.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: No, not after what I told Dwight about firing you. No. Here's what we're going to do. We're going to have ourselves a good old-fashioned cover-up. Have you ever heard of a Connecticut cover-up?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: No.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Do you know why you never heard of it?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: No.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Covered it up.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Are you sure you can keep this under wraps?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: They used to call me King Tut because I'm so good at keeping things under wraps.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: My nickname was actually King Butt, because I had a king-size butt.

Quote.Speaker: Ernesto
Quote.Text: [pulls food truck up to where Dwight and Nate are standing] Where you want I park?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Okay, everybody, gather 'round. Got a real special surprise for you. [indicates Ernesto and assistant who are carrying empanadas]

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: Ernesto!

Quote.Speaker: Ernesto
Quote.Text: Hola Toby! [mimes choking]

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: Yeah, hey.

Quote.Speaker: Ernesto
Quote.Text: Como esta? [speaks Spanish]

Quote.Speaker: Nate
Quote.Text: Uh, I'm going to say "I" when I'm talking for Ernesto, so instead of "he says blah, blah, blah," I'm going to say "I say, blah, blah, blah," but that's for him. Anyway, it was something like, "He remembers Toby." [makes face] "I remember Toby."

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Okay- oh, Jim. Hey, this guy look familiar?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Uh-

Quote.Speaker: Toby
Quote.Text: It's the empanada guy.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: The empanada guy!

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: No, Toby! [bleep] Damn it, Toby! No, I wasn't asking you. [sighs] Ask him if he remembers Jim. [Nate asks Ernesto a question in Spanish]

Quote.Speaker: Ernesto
Quote.Text: No.

Quote.Speaker: Nate
Quote.Text: He says, "No."

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: He says, "No!" Boom!

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Yeah but who remembers all their customers? I mean, I can name like three of our clients.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Okay, he remembers Toby, the most forgettable man in the known world. [Ernesto says something in Spanish]

Quote.Speaker: Nate
Quote.Text: Ah, he doesn't want any trouble, he sees lots of people, they come from all around to eat his delicious meat pockets.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Uh, you guys are going to love these. So, empanadas on me. You guys gotta try them.

Quote.Speaker: Creed
Quote.Text: Usually I'm a burrito guy, but if you won't tell, I won't. Wink, wink.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Great. And while we're enjoying these delicious empanadas, Jim, why don't you tell us your story again?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Why? Everybody's heard it.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Walk us through it. What time would you get there every morning?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Hey, Murder She Wrote. How about we drop the whole 'Murder, She Wrote' thing, okay? Jim was at the courthouse for jury duty every morning. How do I know? Because I drove him there.

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: Why?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Why? Why? [looks at Jim]

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Because my car broke down.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: His car broke down. So he called me, 'cause I live near the courthouse.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Wait, wait. You live by the courthouse. So you drove from near the courthouse, out to Jim's house, and then back to the courthouse?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Thirty minutes out, thirty minutes back, easy hour. And I would watch that cute little tushie scurry up those courthouse stairs every morning and that was that.

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: [to Ernesto] I'm sorry, do you have any American Mexican food?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: We're getting buried out there. What was that stuff about the car breaking down?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Well, I think you handled it pretty well.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: I'm not Rumpelstiltskin, Jim. I can't keep spinning gold out of your [bleep].

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Okay, listen, all right? Dwight's on to us, he's going to figure it out really soon, so let's just get ahead of it, let's tell the truth.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: [sighs] I don't even know what the truth is anymore.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Wow, it's so... healthy.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: I'm going to call him Little Kevin.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: No, you will not.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Is he really five pounds?

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Mm-hmm.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Because I squat with five pounds. This- [squats, grunts] yeah, this feels like more than that.

Quote.Speaker: Senator Lipton
Quote.Text: No, no, no, he's nine pounds, seven ounces.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Nine pounds? Really? I thought you said five. You know what? I was under so many drugs, I felt like I was at a James Taylor concert or something, oh. So, what did you bring?

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Oh yeah, I don't know if it's right, but-

Quote.Speaker: Senator Lipton
Quote.Text: Well, if it's anything like that gorgeous wrapping paper, you hit it out of the park.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Aw, preemie pajamas!

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Again, it may not be the right size. I can return-

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: No, I think he came early just so he could wear these. Thank you.

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: I got Little Kevin Call of Duty.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: This baby is clearly not premature. They're lying about the date it was conceived. It's very interesting. And her husband's gay. I don't even know which thread to follow.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Uh, excuse me, can I have everyone's attention for a second? First off, I just want to say that I'm really sorry, I didn't know that my absence last week would have been a burden on any of you, because, though I did have jury duty last week, they did dismiss me early on Monday. And I think you're going to find this pretty hilarious. I kind of, uh, well, maybe took the week off.

Quote.Speaker: Stanley
Quote.Text: What?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Funny? No? Nobody laughing?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: [laughs] You're screwed! Oh, it's happening. It's really happening.

Quote.Speaker: Stanley
Quote.Text: What the hell, Jim? I covered for your bony butt.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Pam really needed some help with the kids, so, I promise my intentions were good.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Your clients. They're all mine.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Jim, I got my ass chewed out because one of your orders got messed up. And Andy, you said you drove him to the courthouse.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Uh, I did, every morning. And if I didn't, then I hope I die.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: All right, well. Let's get this show on the road, shall we? Allow me to give you a hand. [puts Jim's things in a box] Here we are. So long, clump-mate. I'm going to miss you. Truth be told, I never thought that this was how it was going to end. I always thought that I was going to defeat you somehow. But you've defeated yourself. [laughs]

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Dwight, cut it out. I'm not firing Jim.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: No, no, no. You said- you said that you were-

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: I know what I said. Jim, you're in deep doo-doo. Do you understand? I have one thing to say to you, and I'm going to say it in front of this whole office. Look me in the eye. [gives Jim a limp slap]

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: That's it? This is crap! [dumps the box on Jim's desk and leaves]

Quote.Speaker: Gabe
Quote.Text: [on voicemail] You've reached Gabe Lewis, I'm currently indisposed. Leave me a message. Ciao. [beep]

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Gabe, it's Dwight again. Highest priority, triple-urgent. Call me. Immediately. That means ASAP.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: I'm gonna find Gabe, tell him what Jim did and let the little stickler do what he does best: stickle.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Shh.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Honestly, I can return this for a larger size.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: It's fine. Pajamas aren't supposed to be baggy, right? It's not the barrio.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: The only premature baby in this room is the baby this baby ate.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Ah!

Quote.Speaker: Kevin
Quote.Text: [giggles] Little Kevin.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Really?

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Angela.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Fine, God. Philip was conceived nine months ago.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: I knew that, I knew it.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: The senator and I wanted to wait, but we had just seen Thor and there was way too much wine in my chicken piccata.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Chicken marsala.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Right. Um, point is, Philip was conceived out of wedlock.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Mm-hmm.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: And now you all know, but you can never tell. I'm serious.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Dwight. Hey.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Oh, hey. Have you seen Gabe?

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: He went to the car or something, but he'll be back.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Okay. [sits]

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Don't you want to see the baby?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Psh! Why? I know what Angela and the senator look like. I can mash that up in my head right now.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: I promised I wouldn't tell.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: So don't.

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: Angela got pregnant before the wedding.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: What?

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: She got pregnant before the wedding.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: How long before?

Quote.Speaker: Oscar
Quote.Text: A month. [Dwight leaves, Oscar calls after him] You didn't hear it from me!

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Yes I did.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Dwight?

Quote.Speaker: Senator Lipton
Quote.Text: Dwight.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: I want to see the baby.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Oh, Angela will make you cut your fingernails. It's not worth it.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Oh, yes. Oh, what a beautiful child. Prominent forehead, short arms, tiny nose. You will lead millions... [whispers] willingly, or as slaves.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: That baby is a Schrute. And unless somebody taught Mose sex, that baby is mine.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: He's hungry.

Quote.Speaker: Senator Lipton
Quote.Text: Oh, that's my cue to leave.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: No, you don't have to. I'm going to wear this cover.

Quote.Speaker: Senator Lipton
Quote.Text: Still. Still.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: You won't see-

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: [to Cece] You want a giraffe?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Yes, I am brining my kids in to help me get out of this hole. And you all remember my beautiful wife, Pam.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Hi. Wow, I really thought I'd be more excited to be here.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Whoa, whoa, whoa, game face, baby, game face.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Oh right, okay. Hey Stanley, it's great to see you!

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Whoa, no, no. That's overdoing it, I think.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Oh, hi Stanley.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Split the difference?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Jim.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Okay, let's go.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Hey.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Hi.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Hi everybody!

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: What?

Quote.Speaker: All
Quote.Text: Hi.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: How about a little visit?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Wow, what a surprise. That's crazy. You guys get to meet the little heck-raisers.

Quote.Speaker: Creed
Quote.Text: Hey, Angela's back with her baby.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Yes, well, you guys all know Cece, but we wanted to introduce you to baby Philip.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Aw! You guys. He's licking on my finger, just like my cat does.

Quote.Speaker: Creed
Quote.Text: Let me have a turn.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: No, it's the pacifier's turn.

Quote.Speaker: Creed
Quote.Text: All right.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Did you say something about this one bringing in something for these people?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: [gasps] Yes! Cece wanted to thank everybody for letting her daddy stay home with her all last week and play, so she brought you a little treat.

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: Cookies?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: No, but that would've been a really good idea.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: That was a great idea.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: No, she brought you drawings.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Oh my goodness, let's take a look at these. They're usually amazing, so let's see. Yup, they are. Uncle Andy.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Oh!

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Oh, Aunt Phyllis.

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: Oh.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Wow, these are incredible. Cece, did you do these?

Quote.Speaker: Cece
Quote.Text: No.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: She says "no" to everything. You know, she thinks my name is "No." Cece, do you want some broccoli?

Quote.Speaker: Cece
Quote.Text: Yes.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: No. It's crazy.

Quote.Speaker: Ryan
Quote.Text: Why am I shorter than the table that I'm standing next to?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: There's cross-hatching in some of these. That's kind of advanced for a two-year-old.

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: Cece, this is your big sister Kelly. Did you color this pretty picture?

Quote.Speaker: Cece
Quote.Text: No.

Quote.Speaker: Kelly
Quote.Text: So then this means nothing to you. [rips picture]

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Hey, Cece, why don't you draw another picture for us, exactly like this one, or at least in the exact same style?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: You know what? I don't think you need to do things on command. That's very weird. I'll just take that. Thank you. I think we should just wrap up the show, kiddos. Right?

Quote.Speaker: Cece
Quote.Text: [cries] Mama!

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Shh.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: I don't know what else we can do here.

Quote.Speaker: Cece
Quote.Text: [cries] Mama, mama, mama.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: It's okay.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Oh, it's okay, sweetie.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: All right, all right. Okay.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: It's okay, honey. [Philip cries] It's okay, it's okay.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: All right, I know, I know. Let's just get this.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Shh.

Quote.Speaker: Cece
Quote.Text: Mama!

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Angela, this child is definitely mine. He looks just like me.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Every baby looks just like you. Your face kind of looks like a baby.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Need I remind you that we were together a month before the wedding?

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: That is completely untrue.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Completely true. Remember? Angela. No.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: You said that Robert was not fulfilling you-

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: I did not. Uh-uh.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: -and I said, "I bet I could fulfill you," and you said, "I'd like to see you try," and then I kissed you with the force of a thousand waterfalls.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: That didn't happen.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: And then I inserted my penis-

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: No! Stop it!

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Into your-

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Dwight.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Vagina and-

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: And even if it did, it's just a coincidence.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Admit that there is a chance.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: I will not.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Admit it. Admit it.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: I will not, it's not-

Quote.Speaker: Senator Lipton
Quote.Text: All done?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Yeah.

Quote.Speaker: Senator Lipton
Quote.Text: Mmm.

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Yes, yes. He's sleeping.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Before I go, may I?

Quote.Speaker: Angela
Quote.Text: Sure. [gives Philip to Dwight] Watch the head, watch the head.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Nurse, you know that baby in there, baby Philip? Cancel the circumcision.

Quote.Speaker: Nurse
Quote.Text: Who are you?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: I just might be his father.

Quote.Speaker: Nurse
Quote.Text: I don't know what that means. We're gonna circumcise him.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: [Philip is crying] I know, buddy, I know. Cece, you want to come? Want to come out?

Quote.Speaker: Cece
Quote.Text: No!

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Oh bud, I know. Do you have a pacifier or anything?

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: I'm looking, I'm looking for the pacifier.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Cece!

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Okay, we're going.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Okay, okay, we gotta go. All right, we're going home, we're going home. We're going home, we're going home. I know, I know, bud.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Shh, shh, shh.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: I know, I know.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: You want to grab her?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: I'm gonna grab her, okay.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Here we go, here we go.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Hi, all right. I'm just going to go down to the car and I'm going to put her in her seat and I'll be right back up.

Quote.Speaker: Stanley
Quote.Text: [groans] We'll see you tomorrow.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: No, no, it's okay, I'll be right back.

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: No, just go home.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: It's all good, we got this.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: I have a kid. Last week, Jim at home? That was no vacation.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Jim.

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: Just go.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Hey, we'll be just fine.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Thanks guys. All right, here we go. Let's go.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Oh, whew!

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Dwight, what the hell? You can't smoke in here.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Oh, right. [sighs] The office looks different now. Huh. Smaller. Maybe I just feel bigger. Hello Gabe.

Quote.Speaker: Gabe
Quote.Text: You had something important to tell me?

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Oh, you know, I did but now it seems infinitely insignificant.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: Jim? Oh, right. Nah, forget it. He was doing it for his kids. I get it. Kids drive us dads crazy. Sometimes I feel like they're raising us. Am I right?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: I would love for everyone to just forgive me. But, if that's not happening, I'm not averse to just buying them all off.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Alright guys. You know how we all like the red licorice but it's always buried behind like a ton of black licorice? [points to pile of candy] Bought it all. Now it's like red city in there. So, enjoy it.

Quote.Speaker: Phyllis
Quote.Text: Mmm-hmm. Moneybags. Must be nice.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: So you effectively spent what...four dollars on the entire office?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Uh, I can't get a handle on it. Am I cheap or rich? I can't...

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: You're nothing. When I think about all the gas money I spent on you. Washing my car to make sure you-

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: [interrupting] Alright. Well, enjoy the red licorice, and good riddance, right? [tosses black licorice into trash]

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Whoa whoa whoa whoa whoa! So you're just gonna throw away perfectly good food?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: It's not really food, right?

Quote.Speaker: Creed
Quote.Text: I'm really hating this Jim guy!

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Ok, ok, ok.

Quote.Speaker: Stanley
Quote.Text: I know what you can do Jim. Take those black licorice, then go get some of those red licorice, take 'em in your hand, roll 'em up real tight...

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: "And shove it up my butt."

Quote.Speaker: Stanley
Quote.Text: Dammit Jim! You stole my afternoons, now you stole my line! It's not "shove it up your butt" it's....I'll kill you! I'll kill you dead!

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Eat it.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: I'm not gonna eat it.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Eat. It.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: I'm not-

Quote.Speaker: Stanley
Quote.Text: EAT IT! [Jim begins eating black licorice]

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: [on phone] They hate me, Pam.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: They don't hate you.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: No, it's bad. Darryl canceled go-karting....

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: When were you going go-karting with Darryl?

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: It's a lunch thing.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Alright. Just don't worry, we'll figure this out.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: I feel like a stranger in my own country.

Quote.Speaker: Pam
Quote.Text: Ok, drama.

Quote.Speaker: Jim
Quote.Text: Ok. Well, hey, you're not here. You don't know, Ok? It's intense. They made me eat black licorice.

Quote.Speaker: Dwight
Quote.Text: I have a recurring nightmare that I've been wrongly accused of a crime and twelve of these idiots are on the jury. Stanley is fast asleep, Kevin eats the evidence, Phyllis's name is Allison but it really is Phyllis, Jim is foreman of the jury and pronounces me guilty. The cop takes me away and tells me that I've been a bad boy and we have sex in the hall. She leaves the handcuffs on. They take me away to prison. The guards are all women. [sighs]

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Everyone, this is Officer Foley from the Scranton PD. Works down at the courthouse. I think he has something he's like to say.

Quote.Speaker: Officer Foley
Quote.Text: I understand that some of you don't believe that Mr. Bernard drove his friend into the courthouse for jury duty last week.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Correction: we don't care.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Hey, aren't you an actor?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: No.

Quote.Speaker: Erin
Quote.Text: Weren't you in Sweeny Todd last year with Andy?

Quote.Speaker: Officer Foley
Quote.Text: Uh, no.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: You hired your actor friend to come here as a cop?

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: That is so offensive and ridiculous. I-

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: So if I started singing "Down By the Old Mill Stream", you couldn't join me in a three part harmony. [Andy and Officer Foley shake their heads no, Darryl begins singing] Down by the, down by the, down by the....

Quote.Speaker: Andy, Darryl & Officer Foley
Quote.Text: [singing] Old mill stream. When I first met you, down by the old mill stream [Andy & Foley hold "stream"]

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: [Low singing] Old, mill, stream.

Quote.Speaker: Andy
Quote.Text: Ho hah!....oh, shoot.

Quote.Speaker: Darryl
Quote.Text: Mm hmm.
